shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the extension runs incorrectly.

p.codeblock: void onError(String provider, String extension, int error, String message);
DECLARE_DYNAMIC_MULTICAST_DELEGATE_FourParams(FOnExtensionError, FString, provider, FString, extension, int, error, FString, message);
public virtual void OnExtensionError(string provider, string extension, int error, string message) { }

section.p: The extension will trigger this callback and report the error code and error reason when the extension fails to enable or an error occurs during its operation.

plentry.pd: Error code. For details, see the extension documentation provided by the extension provider.
Reason. For details, see the extension documentation provided by the extension provider.
